azurerm_notification_hub_authorization_r.description: Manages an Authorization Rule associated with a Notification Hub within a Notification Hub Namespace.

name.description: The name to use for this Authorization Rule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

notification_hub_name.description: The name of the Notification Hub for which the Authorization Rule should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: The name of the Notification Hub Namespace in which the Notification Hub exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the Notification Hub Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

manage.description: Does this Authorization Rule have Manage access to the Notification Hub? Defaults to `false`.
notes: If `manage` is set to `true` then both `send` and `listen` must also be set to `true`.

send.description: Does this Authorization Rule have Send access to the Notification Hub? Defaults to `false`.

listen.description: Does this Authorization Rule have Listen access to the Notification Hub? Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The ID of the Authorization Rule.

primary_access_key.description: The Primary Access Key associated with this Authorization Rule.

secondary_access_key.description: The Secondary Access Key associated with this Authorization Rule.

create.description: Used when creating the Notification Hub Authorization Rule.

update.description: Used when updating the Notification Hub Authorization Rule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Notification Hub Authorization Rule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Notification Hub Authorization Rule.
